mapper.update: UPDATE t_stock_daily SET updated = sysdate(), volume_ratio=amount/(SELECT AVG(amount) FROM (SELECT * FROM t_stock_daily WHERE stock_code=#{stockCode} AND DATE <#{date} ORDER BY DATE DESC LIMIT 0,5) a) WHERE stock_code=#{stockCode} and date=#{date};

UPDATE t_stock_daily SET updated = sysdate(), ma#{size}=(SELECT AVG(CLOSE) FROM (SELECT close FROM t_stock_daily WHERE stock_code=#{stockCode} AND DATE<=#{date} ORDER BY DATE DESC LIMIT 0,#{size}) a) WHERE stock_code=#{stockCode} and date=#{date};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_stock_daily WHERE stock_code=#{stockCode} and date=#{date};
